entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is protesting and being spoken to by Hermione.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who has been treated badly by Voldemort and is now loyal to those who are kind to him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one speaking to Harry and explaining why Kreacher behaves in a certain way.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who treated Kreacher badly.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is a person who was kind to Kreacher and whom Kreacher served willingly.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who was horrible to Kreacher.

entities.name: mrs. black
entities.description: Mrs. Black is a person whom Kreacher served and was kind to him.

relationships.description: Harry protests against Hermione's explanation of why Kreacher behaves in a certain way.
Hermione explains to Harry why Kreacher behaves in a certain way.
Regulus was kind to Kreacher and whom Kreacher served willingly.
Mrs. Black was kind to Kreacher and whom Kreacher served willingly.
